ygData.subject: Re: Favorite Teams
ygData.msgSnippet: Admittedly, I ve been rethinking my prejudices against certain character classes, since I have been able to play with them at points where I can fully utilize

Admittedly, I've been rethinking my prejudices against certain 
character classes, since I have been able to play with them at points 
where I can fully utilize every ability of the characters.

Still, I believe a druid, elf, fire elemental, archer, and 2 clerics 
is my current favorite team.  Or is it thief, barbarian, archer, 
druid, and 2 clerics?  

I haven't played that much with a team with both an elf and thief on 
the same team because the elf will run off and get himself killed 
while thief would kill himself and the rest of my team.
